sense.gloss: to deceive, to cheat, to swindle
to falsify, to misrepresent, to lie about, to tamper with, to doctor, to cook
to evade (a question, taxes, etc.), to dodge, to gloss over (a mistake, fault, etc.), to smooth over, to get one's way out of (a difficult situation), to explain away

sdata.j: ↑外見↑↓がいけん↓で↑他人↑↓たにん↓を|ごまかす|。
sdata.e: He deceives others with his appearance.

sdata.j: トランプで|ごまかす|のはよくないことだ。
sdata.e: It is wrong to cheat at cards.

sdata.j: お↑前↑↓まえ↓の↑責任↑↓せきにん↓なんだから、↑笑↑↓わら↓って|ごまかす|なよ。
sdata.e: This is your responsibility. It's not the kind of thing you can laugh off.

sdata.j: ↑笑↑↓わら↓いで↑誤魔化↑↓|ごまか↓す|と、↑亜美↑↓あみ↓さんはさも↑不機嫌↑↓ふきげん↓そうに↑眉↑↓まゆ↓を↑寄↑↓よ↓せた。
sdata.e: Ami frowned in a very un-amused way as I brushed her off with a laugh.
Don't twist your words with me.
